original_text: Which also said, Ye men of Galilee, why stand ye gazing up into heaven? this same Jesus, which is taken up from you into heaven, shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven.
korean_text: 이르되 갈릴리 사람들아 어찌하여 서서 하늘을 쳐다보느냐 너희 가운데서 하늘로 올려지신 이 예수는 하늘로 가심을 본 그대로 오시리라 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: why stand ye gazing up into heaven?
which is taken up from you into heaven
shall so come in like manner
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 본 바와 같은 방식으로 다시 오실 것이다

sentences.original_text: as ye have seen him go into heaven.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 그가 하늘로 가는 것을 본 것처럼.
